text: VegReady delivers delicious, ready to eat vegan meals shipped to your door, making it easy to eat healthy on the go.
No refrigeration, cooking or defrosting needed, just open and enjoy an instant three-course meal.
VegReady meals are 100% plant based, non-gmo and gluten free so you can feel good about your body, the planet and.... that nobody was harmed.
Travels across country on your trip with you!! =D
